name: react-native-navigation-typescript-template
description: A template for react-navigation in React Native using typescript

scripts.install-all: npm i --save react react-native @react-navigation/native @react-navigation/stack react-native-reanimated react-native-gesture-handler react-native-screens react-native-safe-area-context @react-native-community/masked-view typescript & npm install -D @types/react @types/react-native

author: uit2712
